snippet: The former senior military officers received life in prison on Friday for the death of Bishop Enrique Angelelli in 1976.
abstract: Former senior military officers Luciano Benjamin Menendez and Luis Fernando Estrella are sentenced to life in prison for death of Bishop Enrique Angelelli during Argentina's military crackdown on suspected leftists in 1976.
lead_paragraph: The former senior military officers received life in prison on Friday for the death of Bishop Enrique Angelelli in 1976.

headline.main: Argentina: 2 Ex-Military Officers Sentenced in Death of Bishop
headline.print_headline: Argentina: 2 Ex-Officers Are Sentenced in 1976 Death of Roman Catholic Bishop
